typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Year as string,
		City as string,
		Province as string,
		DGUID as string,
		Homicides as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> HomicidesCanadaCSV
source(output(
		Province as string,
		Code as string,
		{Standard geographical classification (SGC) code} as string,
		{Region name} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ProvinceCodesLkp
HomicidesCanadaCSV, ProvinceCodesLkp lookup(HomicidesCanadaCSV@Province == ProvinceCodesLkp@Province,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 select(mapColumn(
		Year,
		City,
		DGUID,
		Homicides,
		ProvinceCode = Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
